sentences.sContent: ...while out cycling one evening and listening to your programme on headphones.
sentences.sCn: …一天晚上在外面一边骑车一边戴着耳机收听你的节目时。

synos.tran: 耳机；听筒；头戴式受话器（headphone的复数形式）

trans.tranCn: [电讯] 耳机；听筒；[电子] 头戴式受话器（headphone的复数形式）
trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment that you wear over your ears to listen to the radio, music etc without other people hearing it
